open_risks: Fed-chair nomination path creates prolonged regime-uncertainty premium (confirmation timing, Senate optics, perceived independence) -> volatile repricing of real yields/USD and duration equity multiples.
Precious-metals deleveraging spills into broader risk via margin/VAR (systematic de-grossing) rather than fundamentals.
Partial government shutdown extends beyond the weekend and begins to disrupt data releases / agency functions, increasing macro-data uncertainty and policy headline risk.
China slowdown signal deepens (PMIs <50) -> global growth scare, cyclicals/commodities down, safety bid in duration; can conflict with any geopolitics-driven oil/inflation impulse.
Iran escalation headlines over the weekend reprice oil risk premium and revive inflation-risk framing (risk-off + energy up + long-end volatility).
